评论详情: Has a rich orange color that I really like and this dress fits me perfectly. I can wear this for any occasion and lair it with sandals or wedges.

Really nice and easy dress - fitted a little bit, but also super comfy. This is a great dress to wear to work when you really don't feel like doing much to look nice. It has a nice a soft and thicker material so it hangs well. It's a nice dress, well made and fits well.

评论概述: Great dress if you are short waisted
评论详情: This dress has a defined waistline, but unfortunately, it was so high, the waistline almost covered my breasts. I am 5'6" and 165. I usually wear size L or XL. I really wanted it to fit, and the size was perfect (XL) apart from the waistline issue. Great, light fabric and beautiful color. I got the wine red. If it could have been tailored to fit, I would have kept it. UPDATE: I went to the company's "visit our store" and found the same dress without the defined waistline part. I ordered it in the same color and size and it is awesome!

This dress is nice and white. I love that it has pockets in it, but it can flare out a little too much because of the pocket. It is easy to wear for church dress or any all  white party. It’s stretchy too.

I liked the stretch fabric of this dress and think it would be good to travel with. It’s not fussy and is comfortable to wear. I think it’s best for women with slender hips because it’s not flattering on me. (When will I learn that this style is awful on me?) I had to put on high heels for the picture to make it look less dowdy on me. The waist band was either too high for the waist or too low for empire waist, so maybe this one is good for someone with a long torso, but I’m not sure.  The stand-up collar made it a little warmer and I think it looked as a cute v-neck when I tucked it under. The pockets are awesome. The flow of the skirt is very nice. Wish I could wear the style and I’d love it. I’m 5’7” and between xl and xxl. I got the 2x.
Nice dress.  Fabric is soft and stretchy and comfortable.  It does seem to run a bit larger than expected but it does fit and looks good.

I ordered this dress to have something simple for occasions when a little dressing up is necessary. I liked that it was solid color, but had a definite waist, and thought the neckline was unique.  I'm 5'5, 135 lbs, and a 36D, and I ordered the large and it fits me well. I might have been able to order the medium, but I'd rather it be a bit roomy than tight and honestly it feels like it fits perfectly. The material is slick and shiny so it's not as comfortable as a cotton would be, but that's to be expected since it's mostly polyester with some elastane. The pockets are a welcome addition and they are actually decently deep and usable!  Overall, I really like this dress and think it will look great with a cardigan and some heels. I could see it being used for many different occasions or events where a "dressy casual" balance needs to be struck. I think it is worth the $40 being charged and would recommend it to others!
I didnt know the material was stretchy, I thought it as as more cotton material.

This dress is beautiful and I love that it comes with deep pockets. If you are on the shorter side it will be just a little bit long on you but for me it worked very well and came just below the knee. The color does not twist out of shape at all like I have experienced on some dresses. The medium is what I would consider a size small so order one size up from your usual. The material is silky but also feels slightly heavy so this would work well in between seasons and winter, though it’s too hot to be a summer dress. Overall very pleased.

评论概述: Daughter looks so cute in this dress!
评论详情: My daughter was looking for something a little more professional to wear to work, and this is great! Nice material, and fits her size.

This dress is AMAZINF. it fits perfect, fells great and has pockets! I love the color and will be getting another one. I have had several compliments and people order on as I was standing with them. This is a must for anyone.
Perfect dress for the office. Quality material. Comfortable and cute. Fits as the size scale represents.

I recently ordered this A-line dress. It is a beautiful dress. It is lightweight, soft, and comfy. It feels very well. It is stretchable. It has 2 pockets on the side and a zipper on the back. There is a color difference between the product image and the actual dress. The color is more nude pink. It is also see-through so it needs layering. It is good for work as casual wear.

评论概述: Beautiful fit, fabric, and excellent pockets!
评论详情: Wow, this is better than I expected. First of all, the fabric has a really nice finish to it. It almost looks like a satin, but it's a stretch fabric that moves and breathes. It's true to size, but if you want to have more of a bodycon ultra close fit, you can go down one size, but keep in mind that the fabric will show everything if you do that. Since this fit me close but not at all tight, it all worked out perfectly for my preferences. Now let's get to the really important part: the pockets. They are terrific! Not those silly shallow ones that can't hold your phone. Real pockets. And they don't even mess up the silhouette of the dress. This one is a winner! And beautiful enough for relatively formal occasions, yet it as comfortable as a pair of pajamas.

This is a very pretty dress! The color is true to the pictures listed and the dress fit really nicely. I wear a USA 1X and got this one size up because I don’t like clingy fabric. I’m happy I did. The dress it on the thin side so you’ll want to wear a slip underneath. All in all, I’m happy with this purchase!
